# UIDynamicAnimatorDelegate

**Protocol**

To respond to the pausing or resumption of UIKit dynamic animation, configure a custom class to adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDynamicAnimatorDelegate] protocol. Then, in a dynamic animator (an instance of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDynamicAnimator] class), set the delegate to be an instance of your custom class.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UIDynamicAnimatorDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Responding to animation pausing and resumption

- **dynamicAnimatorDidPause(_:)**: Called when a dynamic animator pauses the animations for its behaviors’ associated dynamic items.
- **dynamicAnimatorWillResume(_:)**: Called when a dynamic animator is about to resume the animations for its behaviors’ associated dynamic items.

## Responding to animation changes

- **delegate**: The delegate for responding to pausing or resumption of animation.
